Author: bitchboi-ii
Text: Ive tried baby steps before and they always freak me out so much I end up fasting for a few days and restricting heavily to make up for it. I've tried recovery without help before and it's never really worked out positively before

Author: flamingtrashmonster
Text: Could you try baby steps? Recovery doesn’t have to be either/or if that makes sense. Like you could try harm reduction where possible, and doing very small challenges for yourself. Though, of course, I don’t know your situation or how feasible that is for you.
